game.name: Unrest
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Unrest, a PvP third-person shooter where humans and aliens clash in a futuristic battle for control of the battlefield. Fast-paced combat, unique characters, and ever-changing battlefields create an experience where no two matches are the same.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Unrest, a PvP third-person shooter where humans and aliens clash in a futuristic battle for control of the battlefield. Fast-paced combat, unique characters, and ever-changing battlefields create an experience where no two matches are the same.
